subtitle.Text: Steve: So this is the last room in the game, or at least the last room chronologically in the story.

Steve: You did it! Yeah, this is where you find Sam’s journal that you had been hearing diary entries from and it’s revealed, or I guess implied retroactively that the game has been taking place in a flashback,
basically, and Katie read Sam’s diary that was addressed to her and is now thinking back to what she saw in the house. So thanks for playing through with commentary mode and listening to us,

and Johnnemann and Kate, and Sarah Grayson and Chris Remo and Corin Tucker from Heavens to Betsy and Sleater-Kinney who, again, thank you to her for taking her time to record some of her recollections and thoughts for this.
But yeah, thanks for playing and we hope that you got something good out of all of our jibber jabber…
Karla: It’s okay if you didn’t.
Karla: Goodbye goodbye goodbye, we love you!
